page.title: 17CHURCHES AND CHURCHYARDS
page.content:
North Cheriton church was built in 1783.You can notice this by the battlements on it's tower. The church has very beautiful stained glass windows which I thought were gorgeous.
The graves looked old and as if nobody came to visit them.As you come into the graveyard you had daffodils going up one side of you. On the opposite side of the road from the church stands a monument for the men that died in world war one and two. I saw a large hole like a grave covered with polythene.This was an old caved in tomb. Most of the gravestones were eroded which was a pity as I was unable to find any dates.
